titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Hepatitis B Awareness Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Committee on Energy and Commerce discharged.
Mr. Murphy asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/5/2005--Passed House without amendment. Expresses support for: (1) the goals and ideals of National Hepatitis B Awareness Week (the week of May 9, 2005); and (2) raising awareness of the consequences of untreated chronic hepatitis B and the urgency to seek appropriate care as a serious public health issue.
